channel.title: Choppy screen on ALL downloaded clients
channel.description:
Hello, i've been searching the forums for a while and can't find answers too my problems, so im now posting this. I have downloaded moparscape client, and it worked normally for a while, but one day the screen became very choppy. I do not have a screen shot on it or anything but there is another post on it with a screenshot, but that post does not have any answers. I think the name is something like "help choppy screen <friends>" or something like that. Too add to the problem, i downloaded a private servers client, donkiescape.no-ip.org and the screen is the same way. Does anyone have any answers? I would like any suggestions. And my other problem is silab servers. When i load it, it says this: Not Found The requested URL /loaderror_savefile.html was not found on this server.
Additionally, a 404 Not Found error was encountered while trying to use an ErrorDocument to handle the request.
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Apache/2.0.63 (Unix) mod_ssl/2.0.63 OpenSSL/0.9.7a mod_auth_passthrough/2.1 mod_bwlimited/1.4 FrontPage/5.0.2.2635 mod_jk/1.2.25 PHP/5.2.5 Server at client.silabsoft.org Port 80
I have tried to download the client, but the same error appears when i start it up. any suggestions? Please, and thank you.

item.title: Choppy screen on ALL downloaded clients
item.dc:creator: @mskinky69 mskinky69
item.description:
@mskinky69 wrote:

First post ftw!!! and im having it to leaf ima cry

http://i426.photobucket.com/albums/pp346/MsKinky69/Choppyscreen.jpg Click to see are problem
this is all made by me! So dont say i leeched because its cool…
[br][br][size=1]Posted on: November 21, 2008, 01:57:24 am[/size][hr]man this forum is worthless they dont even help wtf is a forum if they dont help?..
